com.topcoder.rules.management
Class DBRuleSource

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.topcoder.rules.management.DBRuleSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
RulesConstants, RuleSource
public class DBRuleSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements RuleSource, RulesConstants

This class implements the RulesSource interface for an Database.

See Also:
RuleSource
